full_summary:
### Senior Engineering Graduate Opportunity

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS to submit a proposal for the services of one (1) Senior Engineering Graduate. The proposed contract, valued at less than $3.75M, is for a three-year period with two one-year option periods.

**Important Information**

- Tender Reference Number: W8486-249647/A
- Tender Description: The Department of National Defence seeks a contractor to provide a Senior Engineering Graduate under the Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services stream.
- Time of Delivery: As Soon As Possible (ASAP)
- Project Location: National Capital Region (NCR), 45 Sacré-Cœur, Gatineau, Quebec
- Contact Information: Jennifer Ouellet, jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca, (343) 598-1547

**Proposal Requirements and Eligibility**

Prospective bidders must be pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS. Interested suppliers should review the [**List of Pre-Qualified Suppliers**](#list-of-pre-qualified-suppliers) provided below.

**Security Requirements**

- Supplier Security Clearance required: Secret
- Security Level required (Document Safeguarding): None
- FOCI Review: None

**Submission Requirements**

- Proposals should be submitted electronically to the Contracting Authority.
- Documents must be presented in either official language of Canada.
- Proposals must comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants (Article 2.3, Part 2 of the bid solicitation).

**Proposal Evaluation and Award Process**

- Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
- The Department reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### List of Pre-Qualified Suppliers

Below is the list of suppliers that are pre-qualified for this opportunity:

- 9468269 Canada Corp.
- Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
- ACF Associates Inc.
- ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
- Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
- AECOM Canada Ltd.
- Akkodis Canada Inc.
- Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
- Amyantek Inc
- Arup Canada Inc.
- Blue Water Sourcing Inc
- Calian Ltd.
